org.simplity.kernel.util

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.util.JsonUtil

  • public class JsonUtil
extends Object
    utilities that help Simplity deal with JSON
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Detail

      • getSheet

        public static DataSheet getSheet(JSONArray arr,
                                 Field[] inputFields,
                                 List<FormattedMessage> errors,
                                 boolean allFieldsAreOptional,
                                 String parentFieldName,
                                 Value parentValue)
        create a data sheet out of a well-formed json array of simple jsonObject.
        Parameters:
        arr - that has the json array
        inputFields - Fields to be input. null if we are to take whatever is offered
        errors - to which any validation errors are added
        allFieldsAreOptional - true of we are to consider all fields as optional, even if the field specifies it as mandatory
        parentFieldName - if this is a child sheet, specify the column name in this sheet that should be populated with the parent key value
        parentValue - if this is a child sheet, and you have specified parentFieldName, value to be populated in each row for that column
        Returns:
        data sheet. Null if no data found or the json is not well formated. was null. case the array is not well-formed

      • getChildSheet

        public static DataSheet getChildSheet(JSONArray arr,
                                      String attName,
                                      Field[] fields,
                                      List<FormattedMessage> errors,
                                      boolean allFieldsAreOptional)
        supplied jsonArray has the parent rows. Extract child rows from these array elements
        Parameters:
        arr -
        attName - attribute name that holds the child JSONArray
        fields - expected fields. Input data is validated as per these field specifications.
        errors -
        allFieldsAreOptional -
        Returns:
        data sheet. Null if no data found. Throws ApplicationError on case the array is not well-formed

      • sheetToJson

        public static void sheetToJson(JSONWriter writer,
                               DataSheet ds,
                               HierarchicalSheet[] childSheets,
                               boolean outputAsObject)
        write the data sheet to json
        Parameters:
        writer -
        ds -
        childSheets -
        outputAsObject - if the data sheet is meant for an object/data structure and not an array of them. Only first row is used

      • toObjectArray

        public static Object[] toObjectArray(JSONArray array)
        convert a JSON array to array of primitive objects.
        Parameters:
        array - json Array
        Returns:
        array of primitives, or null in case any of the array element is not primitive

      • getValue

        public static Object getValue(String fieldSelector,
                              Object json)
        get value of a qualified field name down the json object structure.
        Parameters:
        fieldSelector - can be of the form a.b.c.. where each part can be int (for array index) or name (for attribute).
        json - Should be either JSONObject or JSONArray
        Returns:
        attribute value as per the tree. null if not found.
        Throws:
        ApplicationError - in case the fieldName pattern and the JSONObject structure are not in synch.

      • setValueWorker

        public static void setValueWorker(String fieldSelector,
                                  Object json,
                                  Object value)
        set value to json as per selector, creating object/array on the path if required. This is like creating a file with full path.
        Parameters:
        fieldSelector -
        json -
        value -

      • getObjectValue

        public static Object getObjectValue(String itemSelector,
                                    JSONObject json)
        Parameters:
        itemSelector -
        json -
        Returns:
        object as per selector. A new JSON Object is added and returned if the json does not have a value as per selector, adding as many object/array on the path if required

      • getArrayValue

        public static Object getArrayValue(String itemSelector,
                                   JSONObject json)
        Parameters:
        itemSelector -
        json -
        Returns:
        object as per selector. A new JSON array is added and returned if the json does not have a value as per selector, adding as many object/array on the path if required

      • copyAll

        public static JSONObject copyAll(JSONObject toJson,
                                 JSONObject fromJson)
        copy all attributes from one josn to another. In case of attribute name clash, existing value is replaced
        Parameters:
        toJson -
        fromJson -
        Returns:
        toJson for convenience

      • dereference

        public static void dereference(JSONObject json)
        look for internal $ref attributes and de-reference them inside the json
        Parameters:
        json - a json object that may contain schema references within the doc.
